comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:5.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0
Build ID: 20110615151330

Steps to reproduce:

1. I go on http://www.google.com/
2. I press tab a few times ;
3. The link takes the focus at the bottom left…


Actual results:

The URL tooltip appears above the focused link and makes it unreadable.


Expected results:

Just like with the mouse navigation, the URL tooltip should appear in the opposite corner.
